javadoc: Array of byte[] that grows as needed.

methods.name: put
methods.comment:
Puts the given byte array in the ByteArrayArray at
 the given index

methods.name: get
methods.comment: Returns the byte array at the given index

return.comment:
The byte array at the given index. An empty array will
 be returned for any index not initialized to
 another value.

methods.name: remove
methods.comment: Removes the array at the given index

params.name: index
params.comment: index of the array to be removed

name: ByteArrayArray
comment: Array of byte[] that grows as needed.
